title: Law of Cosines
text: How could we use the law of cosines to find the length of the third side?

title: Side
text: Which side length are we solving for? What is the formula to find the side length using the law of cosines? (It is a generalized version of the pythagorean theorem)

title: Angle value
text: What is cos(121°)? How does this value help us in the formula for the law of cosines? (Round to the nearest tenth)

title: Final answer
text: After simplifying the equation using the law of cosines what is our side length rounded to the nearest tenth?
